title: Basic Summary of Effects of Modafinil
report: A 200mg dose of Modafinil produces the following effects in me:
- A non-euphoric rush of mental energy that lasts 20-30 minutes
- Muscular tension: jaw clenching, tightening of the chest
- Anxiety (Im an anxious person by nature)
- Mild anhedonia that lasts up to a day
Modafinil begins to kick-in within 30 minutes and peaks at 80 minutes.
The effects are like Adderall, except without the euphoria.
Im  a 21 year old male, 150 pounds, have a full tolerance to amphetamines, and am generally hypersensitive to psychoactives.

erowid.citation: Anonymous. "Basic Summary of Effects of Modafinil: experience with Modafinil (ID 81356)". Erowid.org. Sep 24, 2009. erowid.org/exp/81356
